message:
<:down:744193243805384704> Sunucunuzda bulunan çekiliş bir **hatadan** dolayı sonuçlandırılamadı.
Lütfen çekilişinizi kurtarabilmemiz için bu mesajın **ekran görüntüsü** ile birlikte bizimle iletişime geçin.
> **Destek-İletişim:** https://discord.gg/CRgXhfs

guildDelete: Botun kullanımı ile ilgili sorunlar mı yaşıyorsun? Lütfen bizimle iletişime geçmekten çekinme.

none.content: Yeterli katılım olmadığından dolayı çekilişin kazananı olmadı.

handler.prefix: Botun sunucu içerisinde ki komut ön adı(prefix): **{0}**

missing.message: Botun çalışabilmesi için '**{0}**' kanalında bota '**Mesaj Gönder**' yetkisini sağlamanız/vermeniz gerekiyor. Aksi takdirde bot bu kanala mesaj gönderemez ve işlevini yerine getiremez/çalışamaz.
others: Botun çalışabilmesi için gerekli olan **izinler** eksik. Lütfen aşağıda ki listede bulunan izinleri bota sağlayıp/verip tekrar deneyin.
Eğer daha detaylı yardıma ihtiyacınız varsa bizle iletişime geçmekten çekinmeyin.

help.error: The command named **{0}** could not be found.
help.success: {0} help menu has sent to your DM box.

info.description: Gives technical information about the bot.

language.not.found: Dil bulunamadı ({0}). Lütfen geçerli bir dil kodu girin.

prefix.too.long: Komut prefix 'i en fazla 5 karakterden oluşabilir.

command.success: **{0}** komutunun izinleri başarıyla düzenlendi. Komut durumu: **Herkese {1}**

limits.winner.count: The winners of the giveaway must be maximum 20, minimum 1.
limits.title.length: The giveaway title must be maximum 256 character length.

time.invalid: Please specify a valid time. (Eg; **1s** - **1m** - **5m** - **1h** etc.)
time.exceeded: The giveaway time must be minimum 1 minute, maximum 60 day.

limits.max.created: You have reached the maximum raffle create limit. (Max: 5)

create.unauthorized: The raffle could not be started because the bot's permissions were insufficient to create a raffle on this channel.

setup.already: You have started setup wizard already. Please finish or cancel the setup you started first.
setup.unauthorized: The giveaway could not be started because the bot's permissions were insufficient to create a raffle on this channel.
setup.channel.gone: The giveaway couldn't created. Couldn't find the specified channel. Suddenly disappeared...
setup.timeout: The setup wizard has timed out and closed.
setup.success: The giveaway has created successfully! The giveaway you started has published in the {0} channel...

message: If you want to **exit** from wizard, you can write `iptal`, `cancel` or `exit` to chat. Let's move on to the setup.
**Step 1:** Firstly let's determine in which channel the giveaway going to be.
`Please do not forget to mention a text channel on the server that the bot can access.`

channel.invalid: Please mention a valid text channel.

validator.success: Successfull! The giveaway channel has determined as {0}. Let's move on the next stage.

message: **Step 2:** Let's determine how many winners going to be.
`Please do not forget that you must specify a numeric and a number between 1 and 20.`

validator.success: Very good! In this giveaway, you are going to make a total of **{0}** people smile :slight_smile:!

message: **Step 3:** Now, let's determine a time to the giveaway.

`Do not forget, the time must be minimum 1 minute, maximum 60 day. While determining the time, you must use specifies time term like m (minute), h (hour), d (day). While using this you can write the time with or without whitespaces. Do not forget to, only one type of time can be used.`

validator.success: Congratulations! The giveaway time has determined to **{0}**.

message: **Step 4:** Finally, let's determine the giveaway's prize (At the same time it going to use as title)
`Do not forget to the prize's maximum length can be 255 character.`

validator.success: That's it! The giveaway title and prize has determined to {0}.

list.description: Lists active giveaways on the server.

not.found: There was no giveaway that could be canceled.
not.cancelable: This giveaway is not an ongoing one. This command can be used on only ongoing giveaways.

not.found: There was no giveaway that could be ended.
not.continues: Apparently, this giveaway has already ended or has been canceled.

end.success: The **{0}** giveaway has been finished early. The results have sent to the {1} channel.

reroll.description: Determines the winners of the giveaway again.

not.finish: This lottery has not been ended yet. Please wait for the giveaway ending.
not.enough:
The raffle could not be rerolled again for insufficient participation.
**Giveaway:** {0}

reroll.canceled: This giveaway has cancelled. Can not reroll a cancelled giveaway result.
reroll.timeout: Apparently this giveaway message has been deleted or has timed out.
reroll.data.not.found: Couldn't find the giveaway's participant data.
reroll.success:
Congratulations {0}! You have won **{1}** (The winners has rerolled.)
**Giveaway:** {2}

question.description: You can ask questions to the server.
question.too.many: You can't write more than one question. Please try again with writing one question.
question.max.answer: You can add maximum {0} option to your question.
question.error: The question could not be sended on the chat channel for some reason.

time.exceeded: The survey time should be minimum 1 minute, maximum 15 day.
time.invalid: Please specify a valid time. (Eg; **1s** - **1m** - **5m** - **1h** etc.)

vote.error: Survey data has canceled because it could not be saved in the database.
